document.full_text: the cost of common medical procedures paid for by medicaid in texas varies sharply by hospital and region, and some health officials say a single base rate would save the state millions of dollars.
document.title: the texas tribune: health procedures' costs vary widely across state
lines_and_colors: the cost of common medical procedures paid for by medicaid in texas varies sharply by hospital and region, and some health officials say a single base rate would save the state millions of dollars.
